skins.selfIntroduction: I am Kaga, from the First Carrier Division. I was originally designed to be a battleship, but fate had different plans or me. Enemies? I simply slaughter them, but only because it is my duty, not for fun.
skins.acquisition: Will I be able to find a worthy foe here? Very well. I’m yours. Perhaps this, too, is destiny.
skins.login: Justice and righteousness are for the strong only. The weak can only weep in vain.
skins.details: Commander, if you keep looking at me like that, you’ll be eaten up.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I shall conquer all, no matter who stands against me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Our enemies may be strong, but that is what makes them worth crushing. Heheh...
skins.secretaryIdle3: The girls of the Fifth Carrier Division? They might amount to something if they work hard enough.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Fine. If you say it helps you relax...

skins.shipDescription: To hold one's hand and grow old together with him... If it is to be with you, then it won't so bad.
skins.acquisition: To hold one's hand and grow old together with him... If it is to be with you, then it won't so bad.
skins.login: Heh... Let's crush our foes together, shall we?
skins.details: Your expression... exactly the same as Romeo when he lost himself in front of Juliet.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wearing this dress makes me feel different, it’s kind of strange...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It seems quite interesting to imagine a little about our future.
skins.secretaryIdle3: As conquerors, we should seek out ways to become stronger. Commander, are you prepared?
skins.secretaryTouch: It is natural for the strong to be attracted to one another... lean close to me, and do what you like.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You really like to touch me here, don’t you?

skins.shipDescription: "You only live once?" Where have I heard that saying before... Commander, are you getting excited?
skins.acquisition: "You only live once?" Where have I heard that saying before... Commander, are you getting excited?
skins.login: Work hard, play hard. That is my life motto, Commander.
skins.details: Commander... do you prefer Akagi’s swimsuit, or mine?
skins.secretaryIdle3: No matter where I am, there is no end to war.
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh? Am I required for a new battle?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! My bridge is in good condition. Ready for orders at a moment's notice!

skins.shipDescription: One must wear appropriate attire for the New Year. What do you think, Commander? Let me hear your opinion.
skins.acquisition: One must wear appropriate attire for the New Year. What do you think, Commander? Let me hear your opinion.
skins.login: Since it's the New Year, you could probably afford to rest a little. I wouldn't mind.
skins.details: Commander, if you have that much free time, why don't you help me with the New Year's decorations?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Akagi, your eyes make you seem like you're hunting for prey...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Forgetting about war and just enjoying the holidays... this isn't so bad every once in a while.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Go home, Eugen, you're drunk... Commander, come give me a hand here.
skins.secretaryTouch: Preparing for the New Year sure requires a lot of stuff...

skins.shipDescription: This statue seems to have been inspired by the teachings of the Iris Orthodoxy. Though I am unfamiliar with this kind of art, gazing upon such majesty... fills one with a sense of piety. Commander, can you feel it as well?
skins.acquisition: This statue seems to have been inspired by the teachings of the Iris Orthodoxy. Though I am unfamiliar with this kind of art, gazing upon such majesty... fills one with a sense of piety. Commander, can you feel it as well?
skins.login: It's time for the star of tonight's show, huh? ...Don't worry, I'll cover for you even if you mess up.
skins.details: Have you finished making your rounds? As I said, we can always catch up later. There are many others who are still waiting for your words... But since you're already here, might as well take a break if you want a change of pace.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Zuikaku, find some way to keep Taihou busy. Can't do much about her clinging to the commander, but there's going to be trouble if Akagi sees her.
skins.secretaryIdle2: The weak shouldn't push past their limits. You certainly don't want to end up like Yorktown over there.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's not that I don't want to attend the party. If I'm to keep tabs on everything going on, this is the best place to do that from.
skins.secretaryTouch: You wanna kill some time? Hmph. Very well, how about a round of chess then? I've been wanting to see how your powers have developed... Hehehe...
